/* FarmMapper.selectFarms */ select a.farm_id as farmId , case when a.farm_kind = '01' THEN '농장' when a.farm_kind = '02' THEN '목장' else '체험' end as farmKindNm , a.farm_name as farmName , a.farm_zip as farmZip , concat(format(a.farm_use_amt - (a.farm_use_amt * COALESCE(a.farm_event_dicount_rate,'0') / 100), 0), '원') as farmUseAmt , case when a.farm_event_dicount_rate is not null then true else false end as farm_event_dicount_YN , concat(COALESCE(a.farm_event_dicount_rate,'0'), '%') as farmEventDiscountRate , concat(format(a.farm_use_amt, 0), '원') as farmEventDiscountOriginalAmt , c.file_url as farmMainImageUrl , '0' as reviewStar , '0명' as reviewStarCnt , concat('체험시간 ',CASE WHEN MOD(a.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60) = 0 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(a.farm_use_time_detail), '시간') ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(a.farm_use_time_detail), '시간 ', LPAD(MOD(a.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60), 2, '0'), '분' ) END ) as farmUseTimeDetailFormat , a.farm_fond_de as farmFondDe from farm a left join file_group b on a.farm_main_image = b.file_group_id left join file c on b.file_group_id = c.file_group_id where farm_status = '01' and a.farm_kind = #{farmKind}
and a.farm_name like concat('%', #{farmName}, '%')
and a.farm_use_day like concat('%', #{farmUseDay}, '%')
and a.farm_max_user_cnt >= CAST(#{farmMaxUserCnt} AS UNSIGNED)
order by cast(replace(a.farm_fond_de,'년','') AS unsigned) desc
order by cast(a.farm_use_amt AS unsigned) desc
order by cast(a.farm_use_amt AS unsigned)

/* FarmMapper.selectFarmByFarmId */ select a.farm_id as farmId , case when a.farm_kind = '01' THEN '농장' when a.farm_kind = '02' THEN '목장' else '체험' end as farmKindNm , a.farm_name as farmName , a.farm_zip as farmZip , concat(format(a.farm_use_amt - (a.farm_use_amt * COALESCE(a.farm_event_dicount_rate,'0') / 100), 0), '원') as farmUseAmt , concat(COALESCE(a.farm_event_dicount_rate,'0'), '%') as farmEventDiscountRate , concat(format(a.farm_use_amt, 0), '원') as farmEventDiscountOriginalAmt , '0' as reviewStar , '0명' as reviewStarCnt , a.farm_longitude as farmLongitude , a.farm_latitude as farmLatitude , a.farm_use_time_detail as farmUseTimeDetail , concat(a.farm_use_time, ' ', '체험시간 ',CASE WHEN MOD(a.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60) = 0 THEN CONCAT(FLOOR(a.farm_use_time_detail), '시간') ELSE CONCAT(FLOOR(a.farm_use_time_detail), '시간 ', LPAD(MOD(a.farm_use_time_detail * 60, 60), 2, '0'), '분' ) END ) as farmUseTimeAndDetailTimeFormat , a.farm_owner_tel as farmOwnerTel , a.farm_intrcn as farmIntrcn , a.farm_use_day as farmUseDay from farm a where farm_status = '01' and farm_id = #{farmId}

/* FarmMapper.selectFarmBannerImage */ select c.file_url as bannerImageUrl from farm a left join file_group b on a.farm_banner_image = b.file_group_id left join file c on b.file_group_id = c.file_group_id where a.farm_status = '01' and farm_id = #{farmId}

/* FarmMapper.selectFarmUseTimeDetailList */ WITH RECURSIVE time_intervals AS ( SELECT STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(farm_use_time, ' ~ ', 1), '%H:%i') AS start_time , STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(farm_use_time, ' ~ ', -1), '%H:%i') AS end_time , STR_TO_DATE(SUBSTRING_INDEX(farm_use_time, ' ~ ', 1), '%H:%i') AS current_type_time , CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(farm_use_time_detail, '.', 1) AS SIGNED) AS hour_part , CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(farm_use_time_detail, '.', -1) * 6 AS SIGNED) AS minute_part FROM farm WHERE farm_id = #{farmId} UNION ALL SELECT start_time , end_time , DATE_ADD(current_type_time, INTERVAL hour_part HOUR) + INTERVAL minute_part MINUTE AS current_type_time , hour_part , minute_part FROM time_intervals WHERE DATE_ADD(DATE_ADD(current_type_time, INTERVAL hour_part HOUR), INTERVAL minute_part MINUTE) < end_time ) SELECT TIME_FORMAT(current_type_time, '%H:%i') AS farmUseTimeDetailSlot FROM time_intervals

/* FarmMapper.selectFarmBannerImageForMyPageFarmBannerResDto */ select c.file_url as bannerImageUrl , c.file_id as bannerImageFileId from farm a left join file_group b on a.farm_banner_image = b.file_group_id left join file c on b.file_group_id = c.file_group_id where a.farm_status = '01' and farm_id = #{farmId}
